page.title: 12Traffic in Collingham
page.content: Part of the old section of Collingham is the long and narrow High St.which is also the Newark to Gainsborough Rd. Traffic coming from the area north of Gainsborough often comes through Collingham to avoid Lincoln. For many years now the residents of Collingham have protested about this,a recent 24 hour census having counted { {800 heavies and 4000 lights. {Vibration}caused by this heavy traffic is beginning to damage buildings.The noise is at times quite unbearable and the{exhaust fumes }are unpleasant. Added to this is the narrowness of the road.{Safety }can be a problem, particularly as some drivers are not too concerned with driving slowly. The quality of life has been affected and the{proposed by-pass,}due within the next 10 years will be all the more welcome for this.
